name: Julio
text: I hope you like this little app

name: Julio
text:
I did my best to make it look as good as possible! Designing UIs
is not one of my best skills.
I'm really happy with the result though!

name: Julio
text: I also tried to cover all the requirements!

name: Julio
text:
However, I did spend a lot more than 60 minutes to finish this 😞. 
I would say It took me a bit more than 4 hours

name: Julio
text: I tried to make this as polished as possible to show you how interested I am in working on snapboard!

name: Julio
text: The app is synced between sessions 🖥️

name: Julio
text:
You can
also
write
very
long
messages
like this
and the
textarea
should 
enlarge

name: Julio
text: Anyway, I hope you like it!

name: Julio
text: Let me know if you have any questions!

name: Julio
text: Funny story, I wrote this once in production but then did a push with a bug fix and the data was destroyed (because it's persisted in the disk) 😞
